text: Papantla Totonac, also known as Lowland Totonac, is a native American language spoken in central Mexico, in the state of Veracruz around the city of Papantla. ==Notes== ==External links== *Diccionario totonaco de Papantla (Aschmann 1973) Category:Indigenous languages of Mexico Category:Totonacan languages
title: Papantla Totonac
